titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology, e16511: Ex. 37.9-15, 37.15-22 and Ex. 37.22-25

notesStmt.note: One page codex. Parts of four columns from Exodus: 37.9-15 and 37.15-22 on front side 37.22-25 on reverse. Margins are ragged and irregular on all sides. The right margin is the most regular of the four. Written on both sides in largish letters. Tiberian pointing. Not yet fully catalogued. Metadata based on image and Advanced Papyrological Information System (APIS) data. Title based on Prof. Robert A. Kraft's 1990 survey of University Museum Hebrew Manuscripts. Severely damaged, deteriorated in glass mounting.

msIdentifier.repository: University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology

history.provenance: University of Pennsylvania Museum, Ellen W. Harrison Collection. Purchased from Prof. Moritz of Cairo through W.M. Muller, 1910.
